StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCMCAssignedValues]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FiscalYear int, @CategoryCode char(2), @Region int AS
SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID = 'CMC', MONTH_CODE, QUOTA_VALUE, REQMT_VALUE FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION INNER JOIN SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN ON RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_ID = SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'R' AND SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.CATEGORY_CODE = @CategoryCode AND SHIPPING_QUOTA_PLAN.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Region
